title: Sword Art Online: Aria In the Starless Night
description: Aria in the Starless Night is a side story of the Sword Art Online series. It shows Kirito and Asuna's first meeting. The first floor Boss fight is also shown, as well as the origin of the term «Beater».This takes place before Volume 1's main events. it also has a ME continuation.
author: Reki Kawahara
